com.facebook.buck.shell

Class ShTest

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.facebook.buck.rules.AbstractBuildable
      • com.facebook.buck.shell.ShTest
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    HasBuildTarget, Buildable, TestRule

    public class ShTest
extends AbstractBuildable
implements TestRule
    Test whose correctness is determined by running a specified shell script. If running the shell script returns a non-zero error code, the test is considered a failure.

    • Method Detail

      • getInputsToCompareToOutput

        public Collection<Path> getInputsToCompareToOutput()
        Description copied from interface: Buildable
        Get the set of input files whose contents should be hashed for the purpose of determining whether this rule is cached.

        Note that inputs are iterable and should generally be alphabetized so that lists with the same elements will be .equals() to one another. However, for some build rules (such as Genrule), the order of the inputs is significant and in these cases the inputs may be ordered in any way the rule feels most appropriate.

        Specified by:
        getInputsToCompareToOutput in interface Buildable

      • getPathToOutputFile

        @Nullable
public Path getPathToOutputFile()
        Specified by:
        getPathToOutputFile in interface Buildable
        Specified by:
        getPathToOutputFile in class AbstractBuildable
        Returns:
        the relative path to the primary output of the build rule. If non-null, this path must identify a single file (as opposed to a directory). If the Buildable outputs multiple files, this returns null.

      • hasTestResultFiles

        public boolean hasTestResultFiles(ExecutionContext executionContext)
        Description copied from interface: TestRule
        Returns a boolean indicating whether the files that contain the test results for this rule are present.

        If this method returns true, then TestRule.interpretTestResults(ExecutionContext, boolean) should be able to be called directly.

        Specified by:
        hasTestResultFiles in interface TestRule

      • runTests

        public List<Step> runTests(BuildContext buildContext,
                  ExecutionContext executionContext,
                  TestSelectorList testSelectorList)
        Description copied from interface: TestRule
        Returns the commands required to run the tests.

        Note: This method may be run without BuildEngine.build(BuildContext, BuildRule) having been run. This happens if the user has built [and ran] the test previously and then re-runs it using the --debug flag.

        Specified by:
        runTests in interface TestRule
        Parameters:
        buildContext - Because this method may be run without BuildEngine.build(BuildContext, BuildRule) having been run, this is supplied in case any non-cacheable build work needs to be done.
        executionContext - Provides context for creating Steps.
        testSelectorList - Provides a way of selecting which tests to include or exclude from a run.
        Returns:
        the commands required to run the tests
